metadata.title: CVE-2024-21733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information vulnerabilityin Apache Tomcat.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: from 8.5.7 through8.5.63, from 9.0.0-M11 through 9.0.43.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 8.5.64 onwards or 9.0.44onwards, which contain a fix for the issue.

criterions.comment: tomcat6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
